summary: Comprehensive testing of Multi-country Admin Panel MVP completed successfully. All major functionality working correctly including authentication, dashboard stats, feature flags management, user management, countries management, audit logs, and UI controls.

design_issues.issue: React hydration warnings for HTML structure (spans inside options, spans inside tbody)
design_issues.impact: Console warnings only, no functional impact

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with accurate stats (4 users, 4 countries, 9 enabled features)
Feature Flags page - displays 13 flags (5 modules, 8 features)
Feature flag toggle functionality works correctly
Users page - displays 4 users with role badges
Countries page - displays all 4 countries (DE/CH/FR/AT) with toggles
Audit Logs page - displays activity logs with filtering
Country selector in topbar works correctly
Responsive design and UI styling proper

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all core functionality working, minor hydration warnings only)
